cards.name: Dual Nature
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.
Whenever a nontoken creature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens with the same name as that creature.
When Dual Nature leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with Dual Nature.

rulings.text: If the original creature has any “enters the battlefield” abilities, the copy will also have those.

If Dual Nature leaves the battlefield between when it triggers and when a token is put onto the battlefield, that token remains on the battlefield indefinitely. It missed the separate ability which would have exiled the token.
The token is not considered to have been kicked, even if the creature it’s a copy of was kicked.

If a legendary creature enters the battlefield, the token is put onto the battlefield and then the “legend rule” forces its controller to put either the original or the token into its owner’s graveyard before any player can take any actions.

Wenn die Zwillingsnatur das Spiel verlässt, entferne alle durch sie erzeugte Spielsteine ganz aus dem Spiel.

cards.text: {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color unless any player pays {1}. Activate only as an instant.
cards.flavorText:
"All mages dip into the same well; some are just in more of a hurry."

rulings.text: If a player pays {1}, Rhystic Cave does not produce any mana, and is not considered to have been tapped for mana. Things which trigger of the land being tapped for mana will not trigger.
Each player (starting with the current player and going in turn order) gets the option to pay when this ability resolves.

The card’s ability has errata so you can’t activate the ability during casting of a spell or activating of an ability. This prevents you from getting into a position where someone paying {1} could stop you from having enough mana to pay for the spell. If you want to use it pay for a spell or ability, you need to use this card before you start the casting or activating.
